snippet.title: 10 Second Ninja X - Announcement Trailer | PC, XB1, PS4 & VITA
snippet.description:
10 SECOND NINJA X is a blisteringly fast, satisfyingly difficult and surprisingly methodical sidescroller which tasks you with completing each level in ten seconds or less.

100 levels including all 40 original 10 Second Ninja levels remastered in HD. Individual leaderboards for each level. Unlockables and collectibles. 

Coming to PS4, Xbox One, PC and PS Vita this summer.

http://10second.ninja/
